name: Astral Abyssal
description:
Astral Abyssal is a deep space short horror experience student project.

All the stars are gone, and your mission is to explore deep space for the new stars.

Take control of a pilot in an observation spaceship called the Orbiter. Players get to perform various tasks on the ship. Explore and document new data.

Feature:

•Liner story with 10-15 minutes of playthrough.

•Explore different deep space scenario.

•Small spaceship simulation.

WARNING: Contain flashing lights.

Creator Note

Sorry in advance for the bad English, as I'm not native. This video game is a project from my game design class at my university. It might not be the best quality and probably lack some refinement. Nevertheless, hope you guys enjoy the game!
